Kemp bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke na-arụ ọrụ na eserese, mbipụta, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na uri
Kemp nwetara BA / BFA site na Mahadum Tufts na School of the Museum of Fine Arts Boston, na MFA site na Маhadum Stanford.
Site na 1991 rụọ 2005, Kemp bìrì ma rụọ ọrụ na San Francisco, CA, ebe ọ gosipụtara ọrụ n'onwe ya ma bụrụ ónyé nlekọta na Yerba Buena Center for the Arts
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ bụ ónyé isi oche nke MFA na Visual Studies na Pacific Northwest College of Art PNCA na Portland, Oregon

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ónyé ísí oche na-ese ihe na Printmaking & onye nkuzi na School of the Arts, Virginia Commonwealth University. Ugbu a ọ bụ Dean nke ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na Prọfesọ nke Painting and Drawing.

N'afọ 2001, o gosipụtara ọrụ mbụ ya na New York na Studio Museum's Freestyle Exhibition. A tụlere ihe ngosi "Freestyle" n'ihe gbasara ihe osise post-black, ógè ebe ndị na-ese ihe ojii chere ihu ma hapụ akara nke ịbụ ndị na-eme ihe nkírí 'black'. N'afọ 2022 Kemp gosipụtara ọrụ ọhụrụ na M
LeBlanc Gallery na Neubauer Collegium na Chicago, IL
Màkà ihe ngosi abụọ ahụ, ọrụ ahụ gàrà n'ihu na isiokwu nke masking na ojiji nke aluminum foil.

Ọrụ ndị dị mkpa nke Kemp dị na nchịkọta nke Metropolitan Museum of Art, The Studio Museum na Harlem, The Berkeley Art Museum, The Portland Art Museum, Tacoma Art Museum, Fine Arts Collection na Mahadum California, Davis, [aha achọrọ] na Frances Lehman Loeb Art Center na Vassar College.

N'afọ 2012, e nyèrè Kemp Fellowship site na John Simon Guggenheim Memorial Foundation. Kemp enwetala ònyínyé site na Joan Mitchell Foundation, Pollock-Krasner Foundation, Artadia, Art Matters, na Printed Matter, Inc.
